value.string: ***************************Its a master bot which integrates all the other subbots**********************************
*****************************************In case of failure while finding/entering to a field, ERROR flag will be raised and BOT may be stopped********************************
Genesys Data Table Backup Master Bot
*******************************Conver the todays date variable into MMDDYY format**************************

value.expression: $m-date-string$,INFO,$BOTNAME$,Read Confiig.Genesys Data Table Backup Bot run successfully ,Bot run Successfully
$m-date-string$,INFO,$BOTNAME$,File Deleted,Existing files from local folder deleted successfully
$m-date-string$,INFO,$BOTNAME$,Run Task,Call Genesys Data Table Download Bot
$m-date-string$,ERROR,$BOTNAME$,Error in Read Genesys Data Bot, Sending Error Email
$m-date-string$,INFO,$BOTNAME$,Archive Folder, Folder created with today name for archiving

value.string: ******************************Copy the Report files from Local to Archive Location******************************

value.expression: $m-date-string$,INFO,$BOTNAME$,Archive Complete, All files archived to Archive location

value.string: ************************In case if error occured in shared path send archive error email to the team**************************

value.expression: $m-date-string$,INFO,$BOTNAME$,Mail Sent,Archive Failed and Shared drive error mail sent

value.string: *******************************If there are any Unexpected error please log it in log file*****************************
*******************************In case of any error send Hardstop Email to the concerned team*****************************

value.expression: $Error-Description$ Exception occurred at line number $Error-LineNumber.Number:toString$. You chose to mark the bot as 'Failed' in case of any encountered errors.
